alert.note: Alert for Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:33AM EDT until July 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 AM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PUTNAM AND VAN WERT COUNTIES... At 932 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Van Wert to Ohio City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Van Wert, Delphos, Kalida, Ottoville, Ohio City, Middle Point, Fort Jennings, Scott, Wren, Venedocia, Elgin, Wetzel, Glenmore, Cavett, Dull and Jonestown. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
